intro: A new customer! Nice to meet you!
quest: If you can find me three more times, I'll give you an especially rare reward!
My mystical book tells me we'll next meet here:
You've found me twice, but can you find me three times?
The Book of Changes tells me we'll soon cross paths here:
Three times is beyond coincidence, bordering on serendipitous!
Can you guess where we'll meet next?
questComplete: I'm a man of my word. Here's your reward for tracking me down.
Perhaps it's destiny for us to keep running into each other like this.
